mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.state AS "state", a.finish_date AS "finishDate", a.file AS "file", a.score AS "score", a.comment AS "comment"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user_homework( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, state, finish_date, file, score, comment ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{state}, #{finishDate}, #{file}, #{score}, #{comment} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user_homework SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, state = #{state}, finish_date = #{finishDate}, file = #{file}, score = #{score}, comment = #{comment} WHERE id = #{id}
